episodes.title: Why Deadly Cults are Bigger than Ever Before
episodes.description:
Cults continue to have an overwhelming influence across the globe. Modern cults are now infiltrating Discord servers and appearing in video game chat rooms. Twisted ideologies, focused around a single leader, have mutated and are having deadlier consequences. The emergence of online cults is making them harder to detect and is enticing younger followers. 

But in the online world, what does a cult look and sound like? 

And are offline cults still dangerous?
